caption.p: Mass overturning circulation and precipitation in the tropics. The first 20-year ensemble mean distribution of ( a) velocity potential function (colors) and divergent wind (arrow) at 200-hPa level, ( b) divergent water vapor transport [ Q D], and ( c) rain rate in the control run. Note that the zonal mean water vapor transport is removed in b. Dotted denotes the region where the responses of 14 or more out of the 21 CMIP5 models are of the same sign
